name: WaterlooRegionSchoolBusInformation
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Receives the latest school bus and school closure information from the Waterloo Region Student Transportation Service website (https://bpweb.stswr.ca/Cancellations.aspx) in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
